name: ai4artsed-nodes
author: Prof. Dr. Benjamin JÃ¶rissen
description: ComfyUI nodes for the project AI for Arts Education. Now includes a prompt safety switch.

extra_info.ai4artsed_openrouter_key: Loads the OpenRouter API key from a local file 'openrouter.key'. No environment variables are used.
extra_info.ai4artsed_switch_promptsafety: A node to filter prompts based on safety levels (kids/youth) using a configurable LLM.
